author: Charles DeLint
message: The road leading to a goal does not separate you from the destination; it is essentially a part of it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bruce Lee
message: Take things as they are. Punch when you have to punch. Kick when you have to kick.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
title: Thought of the day

message: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
title: Thought of the day
